comment.shortText: ## osaCalls
comment.text:
{@link osaCalls.OSXcomands} provides Javascript functions that run within Apple's OSA context.
These functions are called internally by {@link Commands.osaCommands osaCommands}.
The implementation is in Typescript to benefit from as much compiler help as possible.

comment.shortText: # hsOsaES6
comment.text:
Helpful Scripts ES6 interface to various OSX functions using the OSA Architecture.
[`[Github page]`](https://github.com/HelpfulScripts/hsOsaES6)
[`[Coverage Info]`](./data/src/hsOsaES6/coverage/)
___

Provides a means for calling JavaScript functions in Apple's OSA environment.
At the core, the function {@link osaLib.osaJS osaJS} is a port from [brandonhorst's node-osa](https://github.com/brandonhorst/node-osa) module,
in ES6 using Typescript and promises.

`osaJs` is internally called by a number of OSX convenience functions exported as
{@link Commands.osaCommands osaCommands}.
Currently available functions are:
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.facetime      facetime}      starts a facetime call with a buddy
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.getEmail      getEmail}      gets recent emails from `Mail`
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.sendEmail     sendEmail}     sends an email using `Mail`
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.launch        launch}        launches an application (such as `Mail`)
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.isRunning     isRunning}     checks if an application is running
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.quit          quit}          quits a running application
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.launchScript  launchScript}  launches another OSA script
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.restart       restart}       restarts the Mac
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.sendMessage   sendMessage}   sends a text message to a buddy via `Messages`
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.setVolume     setVolume}     sets the speaker volume
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.say           say}           speaks a text string using the built-in voice synthesis
-   {@link Commands.osaCommands.setBrightness setBrightness} sets the screen brightness
